alert.note: Alert for Cobb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 7:38AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Noses Creek at Powder Springs Rd at Powder Springs affecting Cobb County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noses Creek at Powder Springs Rd at Powder Springs. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in the woodlands and the natural flood plain upstream and downstream from the gage at Powder Springs Road. A walkway parallel to the creek on the right bank will be under two feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 10.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning and continue rising to a crest of 11.4 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 11 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 745 PM EDT.
